title: Ito Junji Kyoufu Hakubutsukan 10: Shibito no Koiwazurai

sinopse:

1-4. Shibito no Koiwazurai 5. Shibito no Koiwazurai Yobanashi: Shirofuku no Bishounen

6-7. Kaiki Hikizuri Kyoudai
